name: part_003
file: tmp_【チラ見せ】ReGLOSS 1st Live ＂Flashpoint＂【有明アリーナ】 [wlPLYUOmtHE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: A rolling collage of handwritten celebratory messages from fans and staff for the ReGLOSS 1st Live 'Flashpoint'.
Key visual of the ReGLOSS members with an announcement that the concert will start soon.
An 'ATTENTION' screen detailing concert precautions regarding lighting and cheering.

subtitles.original: 開演までしばらくお待ちください
subtitles.english: The concert will be starting soon.

subtitles.original:
ATTENTION
ご来場のお客様へ
演出の都合上、照明の点滅にご注意ください
subtitles.english:
Please be aware of flashing lights
during the performance.
